item.title: Unveiling the Fierce Beasts of Monster Hunter Wilds: A Deep Dive into the 13 New Monsters
item.description: Here is a detailed introduction to the 13 new monsters in “Monster Hunter Wilds” Chatacabra Features: A large ape-like amphibian with a stretchy tongue and sticky saliva. It uses its evolved forelimbs to store a sticky mucus-like substance and can affix rocks and stones to its muscular forearms to increase the power and range of its attacks . Strengths: Its attacks are powerful and have a wide range due to the rocks and stones it can attach to its forearms. It can also use its sticky saliva to seize and devour prey. Weaknesses: It is weak against Ice and Thunder attacks. Quematrice Features: A brute wyvern with a disproportionately long tail. It spreads a flammable substance that quickly vaporizes and then ignites it by dragging its tail along the ground . Strengths: Its ability to create and ignite flammable substances makes its attacks highly damaging. It can also scavenge herbivore carrion left behind by other
